scripts.build:validate: npm run env:validate && npm run build
scripts.docker:build-and-run: npm run docker:build && npm run docker:run
scripts.env:validate: node -e "require('fs').existsSync('.env') || (console.error('Error: .env file missing. Run npm run env:init first') && process.exit(1))"
scripts.start: npm run env:validate && npm run docker:build-and-run
scripts.test: npm run env:init && npm run start && npm run env:clean
